::Autofire::

Autofire walks to the pod, dragging energon behind him. He transforms 
and pushes some buttons on the control panel, a plate sliding aside 
to reveal a place to insert energon. Autofire dumps some in.

"I don't think there's any place on this planet guarded that poorly. 
We might wanna do a recon first to make sure, and if there arn't 
we'll need to get some knowledge of what we're going to attack to 
pull it off well."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Megatron walks the amount of raw energon he has in his arms towards 
the

blue. "I
> only need to refuel" he replies to Autofires point. "Lets talk 
first order
> of buisness my comerade. Where can we strike first, that us two 
robots
> could take, hmmm" he asked questioningly, as he stood at the ship, 
not sure
> where to put the energon.
